combatSkills.name: Purifying Storm
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Ultra Wind M.Attack w/temp Mag. Boost & M.Resist and Wind Resist-35%/1 turn

combatSkills.name: Sibilant Growth
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Slow Hi Wind M.Attack & [Allies] Remove Curse & Ailment Cure

combatSkills.name: Vivify
combatSkills.description: [Allies] 30% HP Regen & P.Resist and M.Resist+30%/3 turns

passiveSkills.name: Encouragement
passiveSkills.description: When countering, instead of attacking regularly, it (Lo) Heals an Ally. Prioritizes an Ally with lower percentage HP.
